sources.title: Silver Trail, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Silver Trail (1937) REX LEASE
sources.description:
Stars: Rex Lease, Mary Russell, Ed Cassidy
Director: Bernard B. Ray

A wandering cowboy attempts to locate a pal who has struck it rich in mining. When he gets to town, no one seems to have heard of the friend. Our hero learns the truth with the aid of a female bandit.

metadata.Plot: A wandering cowboy attempts to locate a pal who has struck it rich in mining. When he gets to town, no one seems to have heard of the friend. Our hero learns the truth with the aid of a female bandit.
metadata.Writer: James Oliver Curwood, Bennett Cohen, Forrest Sheldon
metadata.Actors: Rex Lease, Mary Russell, Ed Cassidy
